Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of three lines of Greek text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393886) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393886)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (p. 246, fig. 28)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Gr. 2 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
